blocks.name: symgfix2

blocks.name: symgextf
blocks.content: The extension of a permutation, fixing the additional element, is a function. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jan-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm symgextf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

  fmptd(s0, c4, c1, c1, cif(c0, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  ifclda(c0, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  simplll(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eldifad(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1, csn(c0), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdif(c1, csn(c0))), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(c0))))
  simpllr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(c0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c0)))
  anim12i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c0))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))

  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)

thm symgextf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c4 : c1 → c1))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base `(SymGrp `(c1 \ { c0 })))
  ⊣ c4 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ if(s0 = c0, c0,(c2 ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  fmptd(s0, c4, c1, c1, if(s0 = c0, c0,(c2 ` s0)), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  ifclda(c0, (c2 ` s0), c1, ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧ s0 ∈ c1), s0 = c0)
  simplll(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, s0 ∈ c1, s0 = c0)
  eldifad((c2 ` s0), c1, { c0 }, (((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ ¬ s0 = c0))
  syl2anc((((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ ¬ s0 = c0), (c2 ` s0)∈(c1 \ { c0 }), c2 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c1 \ { c0 }))
  simpllr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, s0 ∈ c1, ¬ s0 = c0)
  sylibr((((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧ ¬ s0 = c0), s0 ∈(c1 \ { c0 }), (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ≠ c0))
  anim12i(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧ s0 ∈ c1), ¬ s0 = c0, s0 ∈ c1, s0 ≠ c0)
  simpr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), s0 ∈ c1)
  neqne(s0, c0)
  eldifsn(s0, c1, c0)
  symgfv(c2, c3, s0, (c1 \ { c0 }), (SymGrp `(c1 \ { c0 })))
  eqid((SymGrp `(c1 \ { c0 })))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)

  eqtrd(cfv(c5, c4), cfv(c2, c4), cif(c0, cfv(c2, c4), wceq(c4, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c0)))))
  syl2anr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c0))), wceq(cfv(c5, c4), cif(c0, cfv(c2, c4), wceq(c4, c0))), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(cif(c0, cfv(c2, c4), wceq(c4, c0)), universe))
  eldifi(c4, c1, csn(c0))
  syldan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cif(c0, cfv(c2, c4), wceq(c4, c0)), universe), wcel(cfv(c2, c4), universe))

  eqeq1(cv(s0), c4, c0)

  iffalsed(c0, cfv(c2, c4), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c0)))), wceq(c4, c0))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c0))), wn(wceq(c4, c0)))
  simplbiim(wcel(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c0))), wn(wceq(c4, c0)), wcel(c4, c1), wne(c4, c0))

blocks.name: symgextf1o

blocks.name: gsmsymgrfix
blocks.content: The composition of permutations fixing one element also fixes this element. (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2019.)

blocks.name: fvcosymgeq

blocks.name: gsmsymgreq
blocks.content: Two combination of permutations moves an element of the intersection of the base sets of the permutations to the same element if each pair of corresponding permutations moves such an element to the same element. (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2019.)
blocks.origin:

thm symgfixfolem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c4)), wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, c0)))
  -| wceq(c6, crab(s0, c7, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c2), c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c0, csn(c2)))))
  -| wceq(c8, cmpt(s0, c6, cres(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(c2)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cmpt(s1, c0, cif(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c4)), wcel(c5, c6)), wceq(c8, cmpt(s0, c6, cres(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(c2))))))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c4)), wcel(c5, c6)), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c4)), wcel(c5, c6)), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c4)), wcel(c5, c6)), diffsc(s0, c6))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c4)), wcel(c5, c6)), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c4)), wcel(c5, c6)), diffsc(s1, c5))
  mpbir2and(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c4)), wcel(c5, c6), wf1o(c5, c0, c0), wceq(cfv(c5, c2), c2))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c4), wf1o(c5, c0, c0))
  symgextf1o(s1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c5)
  fvmptd3(s1, c5, c2, c2, c0, cif(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c4)))
  iftrue(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c4))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c4)), wb(wcel(c5, c6), wa(wf1o(c5, c0, c0), wceq(cfv(c5, c2), c2))), wcel(c5, universe))
  syl5eqel(c5, universe, cmpt(s1, c0, cif(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c4)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(cmpt(s1, c0, cif(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), c2))), universe))
  mptexg(s1, c0, c1, cif(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  symgfixelq(s0, c5, universe, c6, c0, c2, c7)

thm symgfixfolem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)→ c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ c7 =(Base `(SymGrp ` c0))
  ⊣ c6 = { s0 ∈ c7 |(s0 ` c2)= c2 }
  ⊣ c4 =(Base `(SymGrp `(c0 \ { c2 })))
  ⊣ c8 =(s0 ∈ c6 ↦(s0 |`(c0 \ { c2 })))
  ⊣ c5 =(s1 ∈ c0 ↦ if(s1 = c2, c2,(c3 ` s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)→ c5 ∈ c6), c8 =(s0 ∈ c6 ↦(s0 |`(c0 \ { c2 }))))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)→ c5 ∈ c6), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)→ c5 ∈ c6), d(s0, c4))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)→ c5 ∈ c6), d(s0, c6))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)→ c5 ∈ c6), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)→ c5 ∈ c6), d(s1, c5))
  mpbir2and((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), c5 ∈ c6, (c5 : c0 ↔ c0), (c5 ` c2)= c2)
  3adant1(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0, c3 ∈ c4, (c5 : c0 ↔ c0))
  symgextf1o(s1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c5)
  fvmptd3(s1, c5, c2, c2, c0, if(s1 = c2, c2,(c3 ` s1)), c0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c4))
  iftrue(c2, (c3 ` s1), s1 = c2)
  simp2(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0, c3 ∈ c4)
  syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), (c5 ∈ c6 ↔((c5 : c0 ↔ c0)∧(c5 ` c2)= c2)), c5 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl5eqel(c5, universe, (s1 ∈ c0 ↦ if(s1 = c2, c2,(c3 ` s1))), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c4))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0, c3 ∈ c4, (s1 ∈ c0 ↦ if(s1 = c2, c2,(c3 ` s1)))∈ 𝕌)
  mptexg(s1, c0, c1, if(s1 = c2, c2,(c3 ` s1)))
  symgfixelq(s0, c5, universe, c6, c0, c2, c7)
}

blocks.name: symgfixfo
blocks.content: The mapping of a permutation of a set fixing an element to a permutation of the set without the fixed element is an onto function. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jan-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm symgfixfo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wfo(c3, c4, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, c0)))
  -| wceq(c4, crab(s0, c6, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c2), c2)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c0, csn(c2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, cres(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(c2)))))

blocks.name: symgfixf1o
blocks.content: The mapping of a permutation of a set fixing an element to a permutation of the set without the fixed element is a bijection. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jan-2019.)

  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c0, csn(c2)))))

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
